Class InstructorDashboardController

java.lang.Object
com.arcane.arithmetic.InstructorDashboardController
public class InstructorDashboardController extends Object
This is the Instructor Dashboard Controller, used for controls and events for the instructor dashboard.
Author:
Justin Xu
